metadata.description: The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located. When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a private location in the subscription will be used and this value will be automatically generated.

The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated. Use the defaultValue if the staging location is not secured.
SSH Key or password for the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.
User name for the Virtual Machine.
Admin Server hosting VM name prefix.
Three scenarios we support for deploying app gateway
The one-line, base64 string of the SSL backend certificate data.
The one-line, base64 string of the SSL certificate data.
The value of the password for the SSL Certificate
Type of authentication to use on the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.
One of the supported database types
Determines the transaction protocol (global transaction processing behavior) for the data source.
Managed identity that has access to the data source.
Password for Database
Userid of Database
JDBC Connection String
Unique DNS Name for the Public IP used to access the Virtual Machine.
DNS for ApplicationGateway
Azure DNS Zone name.
Name of the resource group containing the Azure DNS Zone.
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of Oracle WebLogic Administration Console. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. console.contoso.xyz
Specify a label used to generate subdomain of Application Gateway. The final subdomain name will be label.dnszoneName, e.g. applications.contoso.xyz
If true, deploy an Azure App Gateway in front of the nodes of the cluster
If true, create Coherence Cluster with data tier for caches.
Specifies whether Local Storage is enabled for the Coherence*Web cluster tier.
true to enable cookie based affinity.
If true, use the supplied parameters to connect the cluster to a pre-provisioned database.
If true, use the supplied parameters to configure custome DNS.
True to enable passwordless JDBC connection.
Public IP Name for the Application Gateway
If true, the template will update records to the existing DNS Zone. If false, the template will create a new DNS Zone.
JNDI Name for JDBC Datasource
Price tier for Key Vault.
Location for all resources.
Provide managed server prefix names
Number of VMs to deploy, limit 5 since this sample is using a single storage account
Number of Coherence cache instances, used to create Virtual Machines and Managed Server for storage.
Ports and port ranges to expose
The Oracle Linux image with Weblogic and Java preinstalled. Semicolon separated string of Sku, URN, and Version
${label.tagsLabel}
Bool value, if it's set to true, will deploy with preview weblogic image.
Bool value, if it's set to true, a system assigned managed identity will to be created for the VM(s)
Select appropriate VM Size as per requirement
Select appropriate VM Size for Coherence
Specify whether to create a new or existing virtual network for the VM.
Name of the existing or new VNET

Address prefix of the VNET.
